DataElement.preferredName: Patient Prior Systemic Therapy Inclusion Criteria Eligibility Determination Yes No Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The yes/no indicator related to a patient's eligibility based on prior systemic therapy.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Patient Prior Systemic Therapy Inclusion Criteria Eligibility Determination
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary._Earlier in time or order._(sis-TEM-ik THER-a-pee) Treatment using substances that travel through the bloodstream, reaching and affecting cells all over the body._The addition of somebody or something to, or the presence of somebody or something in, a group or mixture, particularly, a passive, usually temporary, product of cell activity within the cytoplasm or nucleus._Criteria to determine eligibility of patients for medical care programs and services.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A person who requires medical care.

Concepts.definition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.

Property.preferredName: Prior Systemic Therapy Inclusion Criteria Eligibility Determination
Property.preferredDefinition: Earlier in time or order.:(sis-TEM-ik THER-a-pee) Treatment using substances that travel through the bloodstream, reaching and affecting cells all over the body.:The addition of somebody or something to, or the presence of somebody or something in, a group or mixture, particularly, a passive, usually temporary, product of cell activity within the cytoplasm or nucleus.:Criteria to determine eligibility of patients for medical care programs and services.

Concepts.definition: Treatment using substances that travel through the bloodstream, reaching and affecting cells all over the body.

Medical and/or social characteristics which are necessary for a subject to be allowed to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. Meeting inclusion criteria is not a sufficient condition for entry or recruitment of a subject into the study. Characteristics limiting the eligibility of a subject for the clinical study must be considered.
The act of determining if a subject is suitable for enrollment in a study according specific protocol criteria and procedures.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: trial-specific criteria that a patient must meet to be enrolled.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.28 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. aj

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of either yes or no.

RepresentationTerm.changeDescription: 10.3.20 TL changed WFS from RETIRED PHASED OUT to RETIRED ARCHIVED. Changed Workflow Status DBW 04-27-2016

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 8/29/17 tt added CSI per Round 5 finalization task. 3/12/17 jk added Standard reg status; ownership transfered from CTEP to NCI Standards with concurrence of CTEP/Brian Campbell. jk

ReferenceDocuments.name: Patients may have had prior s
ReferenceDocuments.description: Patients may have had prior systemic therapy without constraint on the number of prior treatment regimens except:  a) Patients may not have had >450 mg/m^2 doxorubicin b) Patients may not have had >3000 cGy to fields encompassing the entire pelvis

ReferenceDocuments.name: ECOG-ACRIN-1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Patient's last date of prior systemic therapy for first primary diagnosis for Hodgkin Lymphoma or Non-Hodgkin Lymphoma must have been within one year prior to registration.

ReferenceDocuments.name: ECOG-ACRIN-2
ReferenceDocuments.description: Was the patient's last date of prior systemic therapy for Hodgkin's Lymphoma or Non-Hodgkin Lymphoma within one year prior to registration?
